department.dept_long_name: Department of Romance Languages and Literatures

course.title: Tutorial-Sophomore Year: The Politics of Poetics: An Introduction to Literary and Cultural Analysis
course.description: An introduction to literary and cultural interpretation as it has evolved in French Studies since World War II. Our conversations will be structured around rigorous analysis of key literary works in relation to literary theory, semiotics, psychoanalysis, and politics.
course.notes: Required of concentrators in French and Francophone Studies in their sophomore year. May also be taken as the Sophomore Tutorial by concentrators in Romance Studies. Open to non-concentrators with permission of course head.
